pkgmetadata.longdescription:
games-util games-util/pyfa Python Fitting Assistant is a tool to help fitting vessels for the EvE Online MMORPG. It is entirely written in Python and uses wxWidgets for its user interface.
The tool allows a user to query the EvE Online servers for their current skills and implants to check wheter a given character could fit a ship, as well as to provide statistics on the fit with the current character's skills. In addition, it allows to store and retrieved fittings on the EvE Online server, letting the users fitting their ships in the game faster.

use.flag: Enable graph visualisations (e.g. DPS vs. distance).
